alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:54PM MDT until June 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1053 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Ellsworth Air Force Base to near Black Gap, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rapid City Airport, Caputa, Thompson Butte, Farmingdale, Viewfield, New Underwood, Curlew Lake, Owanka and Wicksville. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 57 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
